title: What is the effect of artificial intelligence in medicine? - Quora

response.answer_text: Artificial intelligence is poised to become a transformational force in healthcare. The healthcare industry is ripe for some major changes. From chronic diseases and cancer to radiology and risk assessment, there are nearly endless opportunities to leverage technology to deploy more precise, efficient, and impactful interventions at exactly the right moment in a patient’s care.
